price: 7. siendo testigos de lo que ellos mismos hacían (con los creyentes).
arabic: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ شُهُودٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wahum ʿalā mā yafʿalūna bil-mu'minīna shuhūdun
